extendedInfo.description: Video/Music Download ManagerVideo/Music Download Manager is the best app to download videos online from Internet to your Android phone. You can download and save videos in different formats as FLV, MP4, 3GP, MOV, WMV, MKV, etc. This application DOES NOT DOWNLOAD VIDEOS FROM YOUTUBE because of the Terms of service.It automatically detects links from the Web browser, so you do not need to copy and paste them in the app.Features- Download videos in parallel parts to increase andaccelerate the download speed- Resume paused or broken downloads if it is supported by the website.- Pause, delete, cancel and restart downloads- Support for large file videos (over 2 GB)- Support different formats: MP4, 3GP, FLV, MOV, WMV, MKV, etc.- Run in background- Several videos may be downloaded simultaneously or in queue- Automatically detects the links from your Web browser- Open videos with your favorite media player- Support many languages: English, French, Spanish, etc.* This application does NOT work for videos from YouTube because of Google policy. IT CAN NOT DOWNLOAD VIDEOS FROM YOUTUBE.Tag:video downloader,android download manager,music downloader ,movie downloader ,file downloader,Video/Music Download Manager

reviews.title: ADWARE WARNING:LeadBolt makes unauthorized changes
reviews.comment: This could be a great downloader but I\'ll never know because it installed hidden adware called LEADBOLT.  LEADBOLD ADWARE loads when you boot; can push popup ads to you without permission; can modify your desktop by adding program links for stuff you never installed; and maybe even make phone calls and send SMS to make you pay for stuff you don\'t know about.  Oh, and it also can make changes to your browser, like changing your home page and default browser to something that lets them insert even more ads into your browsing.  A similar adware actually changed the DNS on my system so that they could access everything I did on my phone and \'help me\' by redirecting me to some dubious web sites that my security had to warn me about.  Nasty stuff that was hard to get rid of.  I had to wipe my whole phone to get rid of it.  So, this program, which wants a lot of excessive permissions, is on my security KILL ON SIGHT list.  It isn\'t worth risking an infection that\'s hard to track down, just for one of 100 similar programs that don\'t all want to use my GPS and make phone calls in the background.  INSTALL AT YOUR OWN RISK
reviews.author: Mark Oberg
